title: Pig Iron Production for Great Britain
notes:
Data For October 1920, April-September 1921, And May-November 1926 Were Significantly Effected By Coal Strikes And Work Stoppages. Source: National Federation Of Iron And Steel Manufacturer'S, The Iron And Coal Trades Review, January 14, 1921, P. 48 And Later Issues.

This NBER data series m01133aa appears on the NBER website in Chapter 1 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter01.html.
